site_name: Maisonette Flat, 325 Portobello Road, LONDON, W10 5SY
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by condition nos. 4 (details of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the mansard roof extension); 5 (details of all new sash windows, plans and sections (1:20), external doors and roof lights, including details of material and finish, glazing, paint colour and profile); and 6 (prior to application of render or paint, details of materials to be used, including render mix, pointing and finishes, and paint colour) of planning permission 23/01483 (New mansard roof extension, infill, new front door, reinstatement of rendered portico around existing windows.)
